code: import React from'react';import{blogInfo}from'../data';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function BlogSection(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-area",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"section-title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"My Blog"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:blogInfo.map(function(item,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-lg-4 col-md-6 single-blog-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-image-wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image,alt:""})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-info-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"blog-author",children:item.author}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"blog-date",children:item.time})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"blog-title",children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"blog-short-des",children:item.des}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/single-blog/".concat(item.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"gradient-button-blog mb-3 mt-2",children:"See More"})})]})]},index);})})]})});}export default BlogSection;
